messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hello this is your captain speaking I have 2 rules be nice to each other regardless of race and you can do drugs

messages.body: Lets fucking leave fuck that traitor I butchered there body its what they get for being a meaniebutt
